data.name: UNSIGHTED Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Revisit UNSIGHTED's world, Arcadia, through the sounds of its meaningful music, from electrifying combat tunes to serene exploration pieces, all of this and more is in UNSIGHTED's Original Soundtrack composed by Fernanda Dias and Tiani Pixel.
data.about_the_game: Revisit UNSIGHTED's world, Arcadia, through the sounds of its meaningful music, from electrifying combat tunes to serene exploration pieces, all of this and more is in UNSIGHTED's Original Soundtrack composed by Fernanda Dias and Tiani Pixel.
data.short_description: Revisit UNSIGHTED's world, Arcadia, through the sounds of its meaningful music, from electrifying combat tunes to serene exploration pieces.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 750 MB available space
